metadata.name: Azure Compute Galleries
metadata.description: This module deploys an Azure Compute Gallery (formerly known as Shared Image Gallery).
Optional. Specify the name of lock.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container"
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Required. Name of the Azure Compute Gallery.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Description of the Azure Shared Image Gallery.
Optional. Applications to create.
Optional. Images to create.
Optional. The lock settings of the service.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags for all resources.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).

properties.notes: [if(equals(tryGet(parameters('lock'), 'kind'), 'CanNotDelete'), 'Cannot delete resource or child resources.', 'Cannot delete or modify the resource or child resources.')]

metadata.name: Compute Galleries Applications
metadata.description: This module deploys an Azure Compute Gallery Application.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container"
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Required. Name of the application definition.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
Optional. Location for all resources.
Conditional. The name of the parent Azure Compute Gallery. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. The description of this gallery Application Definition resource. This property is updatable.
Optional. The Eula agreement for the gallery Application Definition. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. The privacy statement uri. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. The release note uri. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. This property allows you to specify the supported type of the OS that application is built for.
Optional. The end of life date of the gallery Image Definition. This property can be used for decommissioning purposes. This property is updatable. Allowed format: 2020-01-10T23:00:00.000Z.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags for all resources.
Optional. A list of custom actions that can be performed with all of the Gallery Application Versions within this Gallery Application.
The resource group the image was deployed into.
The resource ID of the image.
The name of the image.
The location the resource was deployed into.

metadata.name: Compute Galleries Image Definitions
metadata.description: This module deploys an Azure Compute Gallery Image Definition.
Required. The name of the role to assign. If it cannot be found you can specify the role definition ID instead.
Required. The principal ID of the principal (user/group/identity) to assign the role to.
Optional. The principal type of the assigned principal ID.
Optional. The description of the role assignment.

Optional. The conditions on the role assignment. This limits the resources it can be assigned to. e.g.: @Resource[Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers:ContainerName] StringEqualsIgnoreCase "foo_storage_container"
Optional. Version of the condition.
Optional. The Resource Id of the delegated managed identity resource.
Required. Name of the image definition.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
Optional. Location for all resources.
Conditional. The name of the parent Azure Shared Image Gallery. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. OS type of the image to be created.
Optional. This property allows the user to specify whether the virtual machines created under this image are 'Generalized' or 'Specialized'.
Optional. The name of the gallery Image Definition publisher.
Optional. The name of the gallery Image Definition offer.
Optional. The name of the gallery Image Definition SKU.
Optional. The minimum number of the CPU cores recommended for this image.
Optional. The maximum number of the CPU cores recommended for this image.
Optional. The minimum amount of RAM in GB recommended for this image.
Optional. The maximum amount of RAM in GB recommended for this image.

Optional. The hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine.

- If this value is not specified, then it is determined by the securityType parameter.

- If the securityType parameter is specified, then the value of hyperVGeneration will be V2, else V1.
Optional. The security type of the image. Requires a hyperVGeneration V2.
Optional. The image will support hibernation.

Optional. The image supports accelerated networking.

Accelerated networking enables single root I/O virtualization (SR-IOV) to a VM, greatly improving its networking performance.

This high-performance path bypasses the host from the data path, which reduces latency, jitter, and CPU utilization for the most demanding network workloads on supported VM types.
Optional. The description of this gallery Image Definition resource. This property is updatable.
Optional. The Eula agreement for the gallery Image Definition. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. The privacy statement uri. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. The release note uri. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. The product ID.
Optional. The plan ID.
Optional. The publisher ID.
Optional. The end of life date of the gallery Image Definition. This property can be used for decommissioning purposes. This property is updatable. Allowed format: 2020-01-10T23:00:00.000Z.
Optional. List of the excluded disk types. E.g. Standard_LRS.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags for all resources.

properties.features: [if(and(not(empty(parameters('securityType'))), not(equals(parameters('securityType'), 'Standard'))), createArray(createObject('name', 'SecurityType', 'value', parameters('securityType')), createObject('name', 'IsAcceleratedNetworkSupported', 'value', parameters('isAcceleratedNetworkSupported')), createObject('name', 'IsHibernateSupported', 'value', parameters('isHibernateSupported'))), createArray(createObject('name', 'IsAcceleratedNetworkSupported', 'value', parameters('isAcceleratedNetworkSupported')), createObject('name', 'IsHibernateSupported', 'value', parameters('isHibernateSupported'))))]

metadata.description: The resource group the image was deployed into.
The resource ID of the image.
The name of the image.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The resource ID of the deployed image gallery.
The resource group of the deployed image gallery.
The name of the deployed image gallery.
The location the resource was deployed into.
